name: Bone Harvest
description:
Find 5 skeleton hands in a dungeon and harvest them using you scythe.

Controls:

arrow keys + A,W,S,D : move player

spacebar : use scythe, harvest

esc : end game

Attribition:

Dungeon textures: substance3d.adobe.com/assets

Player : ReadyPlayer.me

Animations : Mixamo

Scythe : Scythe 112 - Download Free 3D model by AriseAgain (@lins) [8831442] (sketchfab.com)

Skeleton hand : Hand - Download Free 3D model by Team Skeleton Wars (@skeletonwars) [efd1df5] (sketchfab.com)

Known issues:

You may see some flickering if camera hit the walls.

Made with Flax Engine.

C# source code  files and other project files added below.
